CIRCULAR NO.  15 / 2007 
 
 
Subject : In-line Baggage Screening System for Hold Baggage Screening.  
    
 
Major airport operators are in the process of  procuring and installing the modern In-
Line X-ray Baggage Screening System, which will automatically screen and segregate hold 
baggage at four levels. 
 
   
In a meeting taken by Secretary (CA) on 8.10.2007, it was decided that the task of In-
Line Baggage Screening System at airports shall be carried out by CISF whenever the In-Line 
Baggage Screening System becomes operational at different airports, as it was felt that security 
related matters can be best handled by professionally sound and government controlled agency. 
Till then the existing arrangement shall continue.  
 
  
CISF may please take necessary steps to obtain sanction for additional deployment of 
screeners for manning In-Line Baggage Screening System at the airports. 
 
 
 
(M. Malaviya) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
